remarks: Function-builder for the ` N ` -th derivative, product rule. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
dvnmul.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
dvnmul.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) |`t S ) ) $.
dvnmul.a $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> A e. CC ) $.
dvnmul.cc $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> B e. CC ) $.
dvnmul.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
dvnmulf $e |- F = ( x e. X |-> A ) $.
dvnmul.f $e |- G = ( x e. X |-> B ) $.
dvnmul.dvnf $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( 0 ... N ) ) -> ( ( S Dn F ) ` k ) : X --> CC ) $.
dvnmul.dvng $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( 0 ... N ) ) -> ( ( S Dn G ) ` k ) : X --> CC ) $.
dvnmul.c $e |- C = ( k e. ( 0 ... N ) |-> ( ( S Dn F ) ` k ) ) $.
dvnmul.d $e |- D = ( k e. ( 0 ... N ) |-> ( ( S Dn G ) ` k ) ) $.
dvnmul $p |- ( ph -> ( ( S Dn ( x e. X |-> ( A x. B ) ) ) ` N ) = ( x e. X |-> sum_ k e. ( 0 ... N ) ( ( N _C k ) x. ( ( ( C ` k ) ` x ) x. ( ( D ` ( N - k ) ) ` x ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d B k $.
$d C x $.
$d C x $.
$d D x $.
$d D x $.
$d F k $.
$d G k $.
$d G k $.
$d N k x $.
$d N k x $.
$d S k x $.
$d S k x $.
$d X k x $.
$d X k x $.
$d k ph x $.
$d ph x $.
